section.text: wants you to call her on the heights to repair the Station.
wants you to investigate the mysterious signal.
Did you get that strange signal? The [color=770000]Com Station[/color] got fried by the strength of it, but not before it got relayed to our [item=com_device]s!
Come meet me on the heights with some [item=titanium] to repair the [color=770000]Com Station[/color]. Call me once you are there!

The [color=770000]Com Station[/color] is all repaired now, just a few blown transistors. I've used the data it collected before breaking to pinpoint the origin of the signal! You should head over to that system and find out the cause!
Who goes there! Disable your weapons systems and stand down immediately or you will be fired upon!
Surrender your ship and prepare to be boarded. You will be brought aboard for interrogation.
You have interfered with the ecosystem of this planet. This is your [global=uefd_warning] warning.
You have interfered with the ecosystem of this planet. This is your [global=uefd_warning] and last warning.
ASi.. [pause=1] SJiak ksd [pause=1] ---BZZZZZZZZT--- JAJisd [pause=2] ASOasdDIhqsdho ---BZZZZZZZZZZZT--- [pause=2] aopsiaLIdhASD"
M-type star 1000 light years from Earth. 2 confirmed exoplanets.
You can only install equipment for this vehicle in the [color=770000]Mek Factory[/color].
Ah, you must be the new recruit. The Admiral told me you'd be coming.
As the Admiral probably already explained, you need to prove your worth. There's no place for weaklings on this harsh world.
There are some natives here, completely hostile. They've been getting more bold lately, I need you to go torch one of their hives.
Outstanding work! I've talked with command and we've decided to grant you a promotion! Follow me, we're headed to the starport.
You're being promoted to a Pilot Class One, authorized to pilot our small scouting Corvettes. This time, you need to go retrieve some gear a previous operation left behind.
You'll find it over the mountains to the east. There may be more vermin there, keep a lookout.
Well, look who it is. The hotshot Corvette pilot returns.
You've been authorized for an upgrade: we need a skilled pilot to run a transport op.
We've found a large vermin hive, and need to carry out an immediate strike. You'll be piloting this here Frigate to carry some Marines and Strike Drones.
Great work on that strike op! Those vermin shouldn't be bothering us for a while.
Now, follow me. The Admiral has summoned you. I've got a dropship waiting, you're headed back to orbit!
What do you want? I don't have time for idle chatter, this place doesn't repair itself!
Hello stranger. I am the Admiral of the United Earth Fleet Defense. You appear human, so I assume you are another survivor of Earth. Tell me, how did you arrive in this system?
My colony ship crashed in a system and I reconstructed space capable vessel, mined exomatter, and set out to explore the stars. I seek revenge for the bombardment.
Ah yes, the Calamari. We have seen no signs of them in this system. We also seek revenge, although our forces are somewhat... limited at the moment.

Since you are an outsider, we will be forced to confiscate your belongings until your prove your alligiance to this organization. We will provide you with a standard issue Battlesuit, and send you down to the planet to assist in defense.
Since there is no [item=exotic_matter] in this forsaken place, we have turned to alternate sources.
The gas giant here contains trace amounts of a high energy particle, [item=meknium].
We have been trying to set up a mining operation on the planet, but all efforts so far have failed.
Like all suvivors, the UEFD fled Sol when they attacked.
Our ships were damaged by a strange pulse on arrival, which rendered them useless.
Since then, we have been trying to stay alive, fighting the natives here for survival.
